# Secure Messaging App - Node.js Reference Implementation

## Project Overview
This project is a **Node.js reference implementation** for a secure authentication system with user-to-user messaging capabilities. It includes:
- User authentication (login/registration) with password hashing.
- Session management for secure login/logout.
- User-to-user messaging functionality.
